name: Melanie GABBI
what_you_do: Melanie Gabbi offers mental health and wellbeing coaching, yoga sessions, and intuitive therapy, focusing on personal development and holistic healing.
who_you_serve: She serves individuals seeking mental health support, wellness, and personal growth, including those interested in yoga and meditation.
signature_programs: Break Free and Master Your Destiny, 7 Steps to Great Mental Health, Coaching and Wellbeing 3 Week Introduction and 12 Week Programme
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, workshops, online yoga sessions, consulting
current_projects: Regular yoga sessions, workshops, and retreats, along with ongoing podcast episodes.
bio: Podcaster on mental health and wellbeing with a three-year library of episodes on Spotify and Anchor.
business_focus: Melanie Gabbi offers mental health and wellbeing coaching, yoga sessions, and intuitive therapy, focusing on personal development and holistic healing.
